name: Grab & let Go
description:
Grab & let Go is a rhythm game created for ludum dare 34 Compo.

The objective of the game is to catch crates from the left side and drop them on the right side. You must perfect the timing because you use the same key to hold the hook in place and to drop them on the other side.

This game was made using Unity3D, some vector art and music from Jukedeck
